string-array.name: food
string-array.item: A daily multivitamin is a great nutrition insurance policy. Some extra vitamin D may add an extra health boost.
Eating less salt is good for everyone’s health. Choose more fresh foods and fewer processed foods.
Water is best to quench your thirst. Skip the sugary drinks, and go easy on the milk and juice.

string-array.name: exercise
string-array.item: Keep Track of Calories and Food Intake Per Day
Put some Endurance Exercise in your Plan

string-array.name: yoga
string-array.item: Don’t rush yourself through each pose or the class
